title: Request Annuity Performance History
description: A variable annuity holder wants to see the historical performance of their investment subaccounts.

tasks.description: Identify the contract holder and the subaccounts they are invested in.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the customer and their current investments.

tasks.description: Generate a report showing the 1-year, 5-year, and 10-year performance for their selected funds.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the performance report.

tasks.description: Send the report to the customer.
